paper_abstract: We devise a new formulation for the vertex coloring problem. Different from other formulations, decision variables are associated with pairs of vertices. Consequently, colors will be distinguishable. Although the objective function is fractional, it can be replaced by a piece-wise linear convex function. Numerical experiments show that our formulation has significantly good performance for dense graphs. (C) 2014 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Fractional programming formulation for the vertex coloring problem
